title: I Am The Naruto Of Boards ^.>
body:
I will become an [Instructor](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/RaWrI4Hi-introducing-the-instructors) of the boards! 

It is my League of Legends way! hue.
Patience my friendly compadres the time is nigh, the name you see now may be plain and gross! (orange goldish colour) But in time it shall be BLUE !!

replies.body:
"You don't become a ~~Hokage~~ _instructor_ in order to be acknowledged by the Village, the one who is acknowledged by the Village is the one who becomes the ~~Hokage~~ _instructor_."

Good luck!
If you become an instructor and you keep acting like that I'd be embarrassed to be part of the same group as you. Talk about cringe
Just expressing my opinion on this weaboo
didnt you QQ about not becoming coloured ? lmao

I said a very long time ago, when the special boards members were first announced, that the people they chose were so unheard of and insignificant to the boards that it was bullshit. I used myself and a couple of other common users as examples of people they should of chosen because we are actually more known to everyone and actually contributed to discussions. I never truly expressed my intent to actually join them but rather just used myself as an example in that situation.
more known for the wrong reasons i'm afraid :(
For the wrong reasons? Care to explain?
